Package com.example.cymarket.Services

Interface ApiService

public interface ApiService
Retrofit API service interface for backend communication in CyMarket. Defines endpoints for user management, profile images, messaging, and reports.
Author:
Tyler Mestery

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • uploadProfileImage

      @Multipart @POST("/users/{username}/profile-image") retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> uploadProfileImage(@Path("username") String username, @Part okhttp3.MultipartBody.Part image)
      Uploads a profile image for a user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      image - the image file to upload
      Returns:
      Call object for Retrofit

    • getUserJoinDate

      @GET("/users/joinDate/{email}/{password}") retrofit2.Call<String> getUserJoinDate(@Path(value="email",encoded=true) String email, @Path(value="password",encoded=true) String password)
      Retrieves the join date of a user.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email (encoded)
      password - the user's password (encoded)
      Returns:
      Call object returning the join date as a string

    • deleteUser

      @DELETE("users/u/{username}") retrofit2.Call<Void> deleteUser(@Path("username") String username)
      Deletes a user's profile image.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      Call object returning a string response

    • deleteProfileImage

      @DELETE("users/{username}/profile-image") retrofit2.Call<String> deleteProfileImage(@Path("username") String username)
      Deletes a user's profile image.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      Call object returning a string response

    • getAllUsers

      @GET("/users") retrofit2.Call<List<User>> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users.
      Returns:
      Call object returning a list of User objects

    • getName

      @GET("users/getName/{email}") retrofit2.Call<String> getName(@Path("email") String email)
      Retrieves a user's name by email.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      Returns:
      Call object returning the user's name as a string

    • getReports

      @GET("/adminUser/getReports/{id}/{email}/{password}/") retrofit2.Call<Reports> getReports(@Path("id") int id, @Path("email") String email, @Path("password") String password)
      Retrieves reports for admin dashboard.
      Parameters:
      id - admin id
      email - admin email
      password - admin password
      Returns:
      Call object returning a Reports object

    • addUserToGroup

      @POST("/groups/group/add-user/{id}/{username}") retrofit2.Call<Void> addUserToGroup(@Path("id") int groupID, @Path("username") String username)
      Adds a user to a group.
      Parameters:
      groupID - the ID of the group
      username - the username to add
      Returns:
      Call object returning Void

    • getAllReports

      @GET("/adminUser/getAllReports/{email}") retrofit2.Call<Reports> getAllReports(@Path("email") String email, @Query("password") String password)
      Retrieves all reports for an admin.
      Parameters:
      email - admin email
      password - admin password
      Returns:
      Call object returning a Reports object
